changes: Added focus-visible styles to About info button
Created .focus-ring utility class for consistent focus styling

patterns_discovered: Using Tailwind CSS utility classes for focus-visible styles
Systematic component-by-component approach to adding accessibility features
Dark mode compatibility in focus ring styles (dark:focus-visible:ring-blue-400)
gotchas_discovered: Not all interactive elements had focus-visible styles initially
Buttons and tabs lacked keyboard navigation visibility
Existing form inputs had focus styles, but other components did not

approach_outcome.accessibility_improvement: Added focus-visible styles to About info button in Header

recommendations: Continue systematic implementation of focus-visible styles across all components
Maintain consistency with .focus-ring utility class in globals.css
Ensure dark mode compatibility for focus rings
Verify WCAG 2.1 Level AA compliance after full implementation
